Html:
Hi again Ohan,

i generate a new GoblinXna.dll with this new Resolution (1280x720). But when i generate my project i have an error in DirectShowCapture.cs:

"Could not start video stream Could not setup graph Could not change the resolution to 1280x720. The resolution has to be 640x480"

If i use 640x480 no problem at all... My camera is MicrosoftÂ® LifeCam Cinema(TM) (supporting 720p) 

Is this a problem with DShowNET.dll? B/c my camera works fine with windows driver...

Hope u can help me. Any information can help! Thank u very much.

uninstall the driver of your webcam. this not allows to run it in 1280x720 (only with microsoft lifecam)

read this:
http://goblinxna.codeplex.com/discussions/48989

Thank u so much! i will try tomorrow! 

Very grateful

BuskerOne
